channel.title: CVE Feed for ShortPixel -- ShortPixel Adaptive Images (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ShortPixel -- ShortPixel Adaptive Images (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-29417|2024-08-03T06:17:55.290Z -- shortpixel -- shortpixel%20adaptive%20images%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Plugin Settings Update vulnerability in ShortPixel's ShortPixel Adaptive Images plugin <= 3.3.1 at WordPress allows an attacker with a low user role like a subscriber or higher to change the plugin settings.
